text: Hotel for Dogs is a 2009 American teen comedy movie. It is based on the 1971 Lois Duncan book of the same name. The movie was directed by Thor Freudenthal and adapted by Jeff Lowell and Mark McCorkle. ==Cast== * Emma Roberts as Andi * Jake T. Austin as Bruce * Johnny Simmons as Dave * Don Cheadle as Bernie * Robinne Lee as Carol * Cesar Yedra as Clarence * Troy Gentile as Mark * Kyla Pratt as Heather * Lisa Kudrow as Lois * Kevin Dillon as Carl ==Other websites== * Category:2000s family movies Category:2009 comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:2000s English-language movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American family movies Category:DreamWorks Pictures movies Category:German movies Category:Movies about dogs Category:Movies about orphans Category:Movies composed by John Debney Category:Movies produced by Lauren Shuler Donner Category:Movies set in Louisiana Category:Movies set in hotels Category:Nickelodeon
title: Hotel for Dogs (movie)
